name: Mission 13151514
description: Mission 13151514 is a 2D survival  shooter and submission to the Game Off 2020 Game Jam. The player finds his or herself on a spaceship and must survive the cruel  waves of space pirates as they attempt to make it to a distant moon. You must destroy all waves of enemies and keep yourself and components of the ship alive to make it! Failure to do so will result in space-death by space-pirate. Will you have what it takes to complete Mission: Moon?
